blogPost.title: Happy First Post
blogPost.description: Today I am writing my very first post on my new created blog.

blogPost.title: Got A Puppy!
blogPost.description: Got a french bulldog for Christmas! We named him Bruno and I already love him so much.

blogPost.title: Here Alone
blogPost.description: Since we are relocating to Kansas, my husband had to leave first and get everything ready for the rest of us. I am here staying back for a while with the kids so they wouldn't have to change school in the middle of the school year.

blogPost.title: We are Heading Out
blogPost.description: Got everything packed and ready to hit the road. So excited to finally have my family together again under the same roof!

blogPost.title: Landed my Dream Job
blogPost.description: I found a job! yah! After all those months of learning and searching, everything is finally coming together. New state, new job, and soon to find a new house!
